CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1,4 Recently , power conversion efficiency higher than 7% for BHJ polymer solar cells has been achieved by several groups through the developing of new polymer donor materials with the use of [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) or [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as electron acceptors.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM) |
| [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM) |
| [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

Paragraph: 1,4 Recently , power conversion efficiency higher than 7% for BHJ polymer solar cells has been achieved by several groups through the developing of new polymer donor materials with the use of [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) or [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as electron acceptors.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| Power conversion efficiency higher than 7% |

These are the entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph. The entities "higher than 7%" and "new polymer donor materials" are not material properties, but rather a description of the achieved result and the means to achieve it, respectively.
